title: >>> A Time to GIVE
body_text:
... Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick 2
: "Pick Your Poison" ...
But first, take a look at two other issues concerning this milestone event.
A Gift FOR Us
Rumors are makng their rounds ...
What surprise will Steve Adams unvail at DODGEBALL 75?
The legendary, charismatic figure is set to unleash a big surprise at one of the most anticipated dodgeball events of all-time. As if his return isn't big enough, the 2nd eldest Adams brother has guaranteed a shocker come this Saturday night. What does the resilient multi-time award winner have up his sleeve?
It's safe to say that if Steve Adams has anything to do with it, it'll be worth the wait.
A Gift FROM Us
It all started just a couple of months ago. One block from the hallowed Wall High School tennis courts opened a small pizzeria. The owner veterans would come to know and love as Luke, decided to bring an abundance of delicious cheese pizzas free of charge. For the next several weeks, the pizzas didn't stop as players took a break from the action and endulged in a tasty Italian treat.
At a star-studded DODGEBALL 71, one Tom Adams led the dodgeball troops in rewarding the friendly pizzaman with a well-deserved $37 tip, a small token of appreciation. Some month and a half later, pizza "parties" have remained a tradition despite the freezing temperatures and apparent refusal of payment.
Beginning at DODGEBALL 75, the first-ever
TOM FUND
will open; a small collections bucket with all proceeds to the beloved pizza parlor owner. For the next six weeks concluding in March at DODGEBALL 80, the
TOM FUND
will in hopes collect plenty of dough (no pun intended) as a simple way of saying "thank you".
So look for the
TOM FUND
bin for the next six events and give a little back to honorary dodgeball member, Luke!
________________________________________
_____________________
"DOVER Taken OVER" Extras!

body_html:
... Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick 2: "Pick Your Poison" ...

But first, take a look at two other issues concerning this milestone event.

A Gift FOR Us
Rumors are makng their rounds ... What surprise will Steve Adams unvail at DODGEBALL 75?

The legendary, charismatic figure is set to unleash a big surprise at one of the most anticipated dodgeball events of all-time. As if his return isn't big enough, the 2nd eldest Adams brother has guaranteed a shocker come this Saturday night. What does the resilient multi-time award winner have up his sleeve?

It's safe to say that if Steve Adams has anything to do with it, it'll be worth the wait.

A Gift FROM Us
It all started just a couple of months ago. One block from the hallowed Wall High School tennis courts opened a small pizzeria. The owner veterans would come to know and love as Luke, decided to bring an abundance of delicious cheese pizzas free of charge. For the next several weeks, the pizzas didn't stop as players took a break from the action and endulged in a tasty Italian treat.

At a star-studded DODGEBALL 71, one Tom Adams led the dodgeball troops in rewarding the friendly pizzaman with a well-deserved $37 tip, a small token of appreciation. Some month and a half later, pizza "parties" have remained a tradition despite the freezing temperatures and apparent refusal of payment.

Beginning at DODGEBALL 75, the first-ever TOM FUND will open; a small collections bucket with all proceeds to the beloved pizza parlor owner. For the next six weeks concluding in March at DODGEBALL 80, the TOM FUND will in hopes collect plenty of dough (no pun intended) as a simple way of saying "thank you".

So look for the TOM FUND bin for the next six events and give a little back to honorary dodgeball member, Luke!
_____________________________________________________________
